item.title: Graphql Debugging
item.description: https://hexdocs.pm/plug/Plug.Conn.html#register_before_send/2 In your phoenix endpoint.ex plug(:debug_response) defp debug_response(conn, _) do Plug.Conn.register_before_send(conn, fn conn -> conn.req_body |> IO.inspect() conn end) end
